title: Commentary on Jordan Peterson's Biblical Series 2a Why does He bring Logos into Genesis 1?
description:
Why does Peterson begin his lecture on Genesis 1 with John 1? Why such a long theoretical introduction about the relationship between consciousness and what we call reality? Is the first question we must answer whether God is a product of our minds or if we are a product of His? Why does Peterson believe that the Bible expresses a consciousness smarter than what any of us possess or even what our age possesses? Which finally prevails, the physical layer of existence or the story layer? 

Here is the video I am commenting on. I only talk about the first 5 minutes of it. https://youtu.be/hdrLQ7DpiWs 

Here is the Joe Rogan experience video I refer to. https://youtu.be/6G59zsjM2UI 

And I introduce the Jordan B Peterson "At your peril" non-alcoholic drinking game. :)
